channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gixaw Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gixaw Chat

item.title: CVE-2024-7816|2024-09-12T14:10:40.055Z -- unknown -- gixaw%20chat
item.description: The Gixaw Chat WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-7816|2024-09-12T06:00:04.807Z -- unknown -- gixaw%20chat
item.description: The Gixaw Chat WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.
